title: Pampered Cute Mommy & Awesome President Daddy - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Female Protagonist
author: Luo Yi Xue   落亦雪
description:
She sold her soul for 5 million yuan to be a surrogate.
After she gave the birth, she was forced to part from her baby.
Years later, that so-called president looked at this chick.
“You stole away my girl. How dare you?! And you are even to take away my boy?” President sama curved the corner of his mouth into a snicker, “Sweetheart wifey, how about taking me away with you too.”>
